sentences.en: “Deborah believes him, indicating, for starters, that she isn't the brightest”(&b{Judith Crist})
sentences.cn: “德博拉丰信任他，这说明起初她不是最聪明的”(&b{朱迪思·克里斯特})

sentences.en: A car's starter is basically an electric motor.
sentences.cn: 汽车的启动装置基本上是个电动机。

sentences.en: Ability: Self starter and ability to work with limited amount of supervision.
sentences.cn: 能力: 主动性并能在较少指导下工作.

sentences.en: As a business proposition, it's a non-starter.
sentences.cn: 作为一份商业建议，它不可能取得成功。

sentences.en: As the starter's gun booms, the boats spring into action.
sentences.cn: 信号弹划过上空, 龙舟夺标开始了.

sentences.en: Col trane was something of a late and hesitant starter.
sentences.cn: 柯川有点大器晚成,起步晚且犹豫不决.

sentences.en: Dinner consisted of a starter a main course and a dessert.
sentences.cn: 正餐由开胃菜、主菜和甜食组成.

sentences.en: He gave a hard pull on the starter rope.
sentences.cn: 他用力拉了一下起动器的带子.

sentences.en: His speech was the party starter.
sentences.cn: 他的演说是宴会的开端.

sentences.en: I've taken out the wire to the starter.
sentences.cn: 我把起动器的电线拔出来了.

sentences.en: Number 18 in the 2.30 at Lingfield is a non - starter .
sentences.cn: 在灵 菲尔德2时30分一场赛马中,第18号马不出赛.

sentences.en: Soft starter reduce the electric shock to the electrical net.
sentences.cn: 降低起动过程中对电网的电气冲击.

sentences.en: The starter fired his starting gun.
This paper introduces performance and application effect of motor soft - starter.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了电动机软起动器的性能以及在电动机上的应用效果.

sentences.en: This starter kit also contains placeholder classes for customizing other functionality.
sentences.cn: 此初学者工具包还包含用于自定义其他功能的占位符类.

sentences.en: We had soup as a starter , followed by steak.
sentences.cn: 我们的第一道菜是汤，接下来是牛排。

sentences.en: We've seen your works: tell us, how starter your artistical research?
sentences.cn: 我们看到了您的作品: 请告诉我们, 您是怎么开始您的艺术研究的?

words.tran_cn: 起动机；发令员；第一道菜；发射装置；发起者

phrases.tran_cn: 马达起动器；电动机起动器
（马、赛跑运动员等竞赛者）等候号令准备起跑

trans.tran_cn: （发动机的）启动装置，参赛人，（主菜之前的）开胃小吃，（赛跑等的）发令员
trans.tran_en: a small amount of food eaten at the start of a meal before the main part
